name: GROUP_FACILITATORS
description: A table describing the facilitators for a group.

columns.name: PAT_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the group record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: GROUP_FACILITATORS_ID
columns.description: The facilitators (linked to SER) who taught the group
